display_name: Salomon Men Black Quest Sports Shoes
description: Style Note The salomon Quest 4D GTX boots is a heavy duty hiking shoe that performs well if you're a light/fast to medium hiker. The brand considered its trail-running shoe and used the design for a backpacking boot. A pair for the pros, this shoe provides great arch support and is roomy around the toes (unlike most hiking boots) The USP of this boot is its 4D Advanced Chassis that controls flex, reduces ankle strain, enhances stability and protects feet from rough terrain. The secure heel cupping enhances the stability of the boot and the lateral ankle support renders this pair great for climbing or descending. The shoe exhibits good traction on rocks, sand, landscapes with tree roots and grass  furthermore, the sturdy rubber capping protects the toe against accidental stubbing while in the wild. Bottom line - this is a lightweight boot with excellent stability and support without the typical unwieldiness of hiking shoes. Weighing 649.2 grams, this is great for urban wear as well. Product Details Nylon textile and split suede upper with a high top, has a rubber toe cap and heel guard Heel sling at the heel collar to prevent abrasion High collar that steeps low at the ankle rear with ample padding Padded tongue with a lace-lock, central nylon lace-ups with plastic eyelets and metal hooks Polyester lining to wick sweat away with mesh lining for the collar and tongue upper Waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane at the bootie lines for a dry and comfy feel Removable Ortholite footbed engineered with anti-microbial treatment and is partially made of recycled tire and a molded EVA midsole The 4D Advanced Chassis is made of thermoplastic urethane 4D stands for the four layers - the foam insole, the midsole support plate, a cushioning pad in the sole and the outsole Contagrip outsole made of high wear abrasion resistant rubber which has an ascending lug pattern at the forefoot and braking pattern at the heel region Material and Care Leather, textile Clean with a leather brush Do not store under sunlight or wash

display_name: Nike Men's Lunarswift 2 Black Blue Shoe
description: EXPERIENCE THE JOY OF FRESH RUNS An absolutely dynamic running shoe, the nike Lunarswift+ offers seamless comfort, distance-busting cushioning and runner specific support. Offering soft cushioning and support with every stride, the nike Lunarswift+ features a LunarLite cushioning system that ensures a springy effect for the feet. The Nike Lunarswift+ range of shoes a low profile midsole that ensures a firmer feel to the underfoot. It’s a highly recommended shoe for underpronators and overpronators with ample cushioning and stability provided in the medial and lateral side of the shoe. Breezy touch to snug shoes With a stitchless upper, Nike Lunarswift+ shoes reduce irritation to the feet and enhance the comfort factor. The upper of these shoes are constructed using lightweight synthetic mesh and synthetic overlays ensuring ample ventilation for the feet, keeping them dry and comfortable even during long runs. To test the breathability aspect, wear really thin socks and move around in the Nike Lunarswift+ and feel the breeze moving in and out. Added to this is a robust heel counter that provides an absolutely snug and secure Fit to the rearfoot. Adapts to the runner's needs Light in weight and weighing just about 306 grams, this range of shoes are employed with Lunarlon cushioning system in the midsole that is made up of a soft, resilient foam core. This is encased in a supportive foam carrier ensuring a lightweight blend of plush cushioning and springy response. This support platform is dynamic enough to respond to the runner’s changing needs. It adopts to the wearer’s stride through each run giving the right amount of support and stability. No wonder overpronators prefer the Nike Lunarswift+ as the wedged carrier foam in the Lunarlon system limits excessive pronation, without adding weight or stiffness of a traditional medial post. When it comes to neutral pronators, this pronation control feature is not activated. For such runners, the dynamic support platform enhances cushioning, converting this same shoe into a neutral running shoe. Stay safe in the dark The outsole of the Nike Lunarswift+ has flex grooves along its length and breadth ensuring flexibility in every stride. display_name: Reebok Men's Zigfuel Black Yellow Shoe
description: The first of the ZigTech range of reebok shoes, the reebok ZigFuel is a huge favourite among those who love to run and feel the energy returning with every stride. Built with patented sole technology, the reebok ZigFuel maximizes energy return to the feet, offering a soft and springy ride: a complete energy drink for your feet that makes your key leg muscles so that you can do more. Fuel your every stride Replete with a DMX Sheer cushioning that minimizes shock on impact, and a PU sockliner that provides a smooth, cushioned and silky touch to the feet, the Reebok ZigFuel is one of the lightest cross trainers ever created. The upper is made of synthetic mesh and overlays for ample breathability and structural support. It is also employed with reflective properties to make tech shoe visible and safe even in low light conditions. Equipped with a padded tongue, collar and soft inner lining, the Reebok ZigFuel provides an absolutely snug and comfortable Fit. The outsole of the shoe is designed in the patented zig-zag pattern using DMX Shear foam. This is separated into a different panel altogether from heel to mid-foot and onto the forefoot to reduce impact on key muscle groups when running, providing a smooth heel to toe transition. Energetic from kick-off Light and energetic from the word Go, the Reebok ZigFuel reduces impact on the heel, which is especially beneficial for midfoot to heelstrike runners who land on their heels first. The Zig technology, coupled with the DMX Shear cushioning panels reduces impact and evenly distributes shock, returning maximum energy to the feet. This reduced heel stress and extra comfort allows you to run longer and stronger. In short, if you're looking for a shoe that adds fuel to your runs with that extra cushioned support and strainless experience for your shins, feet and glutes, the ZigFuel is what you need. Upper   Mesh uppers with synthetic overlays provide breath ability  Lace-ups for snug fit  Cushioned collar, tongue and foot bed for extra comfort  Soft, breathable fabric lining for comfort  Mesh tongue for greater breath ability  Play Dry lining on the insole for moisture management  PU sockliner for added cushioning and support  DMX Shear technology provides vertical and horizontal cushioning and reduces stress of heel impact   Midsole   Full-length Phylon midsole for lightweight cushioning   Outsole   ZigTech's unique zigzag sole designed to optimize energy return, helps to propel you forward with each step and reduces wear and tear on your shins by 20%  Forefoot flex grooves for flexibility and better running performance  Multi-surface outsole for optimal traction  TPU medial post for mid foot pronation control  Carbon-rubber heel strike offers durability and traction on any surface   Shoe care Rub surface with clean, damp cloth to remove dust Do not machine wash Do not store in direct sunlight
